question: ___________ means the ability to understand a language and use written and spoken language. People like poets, writers, have this category of intelligence.
Machine Learning is the superset that contains AI
In_____________ there is no way to access the components of an individual sentence.
Goal-driven search is most useful when the initial data are provided, and it is not clear what the goal is
In Depth First Search algorithm the open list is a queue
Systems that act and think rationally represent _______
_____________is a labeled graph used to describe relations (including properties) of objects, concepts, situations, or actions.
An interpretation of a set of propositions is the assignment of a truth value, either T or F, to each propositional symbol.
An argument is a sequence of statements that end with a conclusion.
Which rule of inference is used in each of these arguments, "If it is Thursday then the downtown will be crowded. It is Thursday. Thus, the downtown is crowded."
Which rule of inference is used in each of these arguments, "If it rains today, the local office will be closed. The local office is not closed today. Thus, it did not rains today."

What rule of inference is used in this argument? "If I go for a balanced diet, then I will be fit. If I will be fit, then I will remain healthy. Therefore, if I go for a balanced diet, then I will remain healthy."
